text:
Anyone have a favorite scraping tool, ideally one that’s good for blog articles?

I need to pull a client’s old articles off their site before we launch the new site and they have a gazillion so would like something very streamlined. Unfortunately they are not nested under /blog which could complicate things (even though they are all in the blog section), may have to use a scraper that I train.

Any ideas? I used to use <http://import.io|import.io> but that was years ago and I’m wondering if there’s something better, or something more aligned for this task
